attributes.action: The In / Out referendum free vote must include all MP's of every party.
attributes.background: The Tory party has lead the way, by allowing all MP's to freely vote in this referendum, one of the most important of British votes ever held and it needs to be totally transparent and fair, no party politics should be involved as this vote will effect every person in this country whether we stay/go

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

How political parties instruct their MPs to vote in Parliament is a matter for political parties. 

Referendums (and other elections) are secret ballots. MPs, just like other citizens, are free to vote how they wish.
